name: Pong Strike
description:
Pong Strike is a local players(1-4) style Game. It started out as an experiment with AI, and will remain a slightly experimental, for-fun game project.

__________________________________________

News:- (June 27,2017)

I am Done to Add Sounds! Sounds are already done to add and "Player vs Player"

also be Added. Soon I complete 1-4 game!

Controls:-

  • W or S(Up or Down)
  • Left Mouse Button(LMB) to Shoot Ball

___________________________________

Bugs(Solutions):-

At the Way you dont find Any Bug If u find you can write in Comments!

__________________________________

Installation:-

Open your Pong Strike.zip file and drag the Pong Strike folder to somewhere on your computer. Now open your new Pong Strike folder and start the game.

For people getting the "There should be 'Pong Strike_Data' folder next to the executable" error on windows: Make sure you extract the game by dragging the Pong Strike folder from the Pong Strike.zip file to somewhere on your computer. Now open your NEW Pong Strike Folder and start the .exe file.

____________________

Hope You Like This Game!

Thanks for Viewing and Downloading for the Game and Also Give me Feedback to Improve the Game much more!
